COMMAND.NAME: undotoggle
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: If there is redo information for bufferName redo. If not, then if there is undo information for bufferName undo. If not, return an error.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
